summary: Build a modern, responsive marketing website for “Smart College System”, an AI-powered college management platform, with a clean blue/white academic UI, smooth animations, and sections showcasing core AI modules plus contact/social footer.

existing_features.title: Build a modern, responsive landing website named “Smart College System” with an academic blue/white theme, professional typography, card-based layout, icons, and smooth UI animations; ensure the full site works well on mobile and desktop.

Implement the landing page structure with the required sections and English user-facing text: Hero (with headline exactly “Smart College System – AI-Powered Education Management”), Features (icons + brief explanations), Dashboard preview mockup section, Benefits section (Students / Faculty / Admin), About & Future Scope of AI in education, Contact form, and Footer with social links.

Add feature showcase cards/tiles for the seven core modules, each with an icon and a concise description: AI Student Portal, AI Chatbot / Virtual Assistant, Smart Analytics Dashboard, AI Faculty Assistant, Face Recognition Attendance (Concept/Demo), Smart Admissions System, and Campus Intelligence.

Create a “Dashboard Preview” section that visually demonstrates the platform with screenshot-style mockups (static images) and accompanying captions for student performance, attendance, notifications, and analytics.

Add a “Face Recognition Attendance (Concept/Demo)” section that explains the AI-based face attendance workflow and includes camera UI-style mockup visuals plus a simple step-by-step workflow visualization (conceptual, not real face recognition).

Include lightweight interactive demos (no external AI/LLM integration): (1) a Smart Admissions eligibility checker form (marks, category, course preference) that shows instant results client-side; (2) a Chatbot UI mock that answers a fixed set of FAQs about courses, fees, timetable, exams, results, and campus services.
Implement a Contact form that lets users submit name, email, subject, and message; persist submissions in the Motoko canister and show a clear success/error state in the UI.

Apply a consistent, innovative, trustworthy visual direction suitable for a final-year project/startup MVP demo while staying within the requested academic blue/white palette; define a coherent set of UI tokens (primary/secondary colors, surface colors, typography scale, spacing, button styles) and use them throughout.

Add static “Smart Analytics Dashboard” visuals (charts/graphs) illustrating student performance trends, risk prediction, and improvement suggestions (conceptual). Charts can be illustrative (static images or simple client-side chart rendering) but must not require external services.

Add a simple top navigation (or sticky header) with links to major sections (Features, Dashboard, Benefits, About, Contact) and ensure accessibility basics (semantic headings, keyboard navigation, focus states, contrast).
Render all generated image assets from the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the UI (do not serve images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create responsive, modern website UI (blue/white academic theme) optimized for desktop and mobile with cards, icons, and smooth animations
Add hero section with headline “Smart College System – AI-Powered Education Management”

Add feature showcase sections with icons and brief explanations for: AI Student Portal, AI Chatbot, Smart Analytics Dashboard, AI Faculty Assistant, Face Recognition Attendance (concept/demo), Smart Admissions System, Campus Intelligence
Add benefits section tailored for Students, Faculty, and Admin
Add About section including future scope of AI in education
Add contact form plus footer with social links

architectural_notes: Use a clean, modern component-based layout with responsive design for both mobile and desktop.
Adopt an academic color theme (blue/white) and modern UI patterns (cards, icons, dashboards) with smooth animations.
